00024 /* Quick Return page */
00025 
00026 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 // start the session
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00030 
00031 // load settings from database
00032 utility::loadSettings($dbs);
00033 
00034 // privileges checking
00035 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('circulation', 'r');
00036 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('circulation', 'w');
00037 
00038 if (!($can_read AND $can_write)) {
00039     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to view this section').'</div>');
00040 }
00041 
00042 // check if quick return is enabled
00043 if (!$sysconf['quick_return']) {
00044     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('Quick Return is disabled').'</div');
00045 }
00046 ?>

00050     <?php echo strtoupper(__('Quick Return')); ?> - <?php echo __('Insert an item ID to return collection with keyboard or barcode reader'); ?>
